price: 77. Mpe bakobelelaka: Oh Mâlik! Nkolo wayo aboma biso, akoyanolaka bango: Botikali libela o kati na yango.
arabic: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi ʿalaynā rabbuka qāla innakum mākithūna
